title: Constructivist Mathematics Problem-Solving Strategies Using Online Discussion Boards

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematical fundamentals and online learning tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical math problem-solving competency enhancement course for current industry professionals, promoting peer learning and social interaction via discussion boards

learning_goals: Learners can structure mathematical problem-solving processes and engage in collaborative discussions with peers on discussion boards
Learners can analyze real-life applications of mathematical concepts using discussion strategies based on constructivist principles
Learners can present evidence (formative assessment) of improving their problem-solving approaches based on discussion board feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
